'''Sakura Shrimp Crackers''' is a [[food]] that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Sakura Shrimp Crackers is obtainable from [[Shimura Kanbei]] at [[Shimura's]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Sakura Shrimp Crackers increases the party's HP by '''20'''/'''22'''/'''25'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

|type = Cooking

|Potato = 3
